TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HoldStatus extends System.Enum

summary.span: Define o estado de espera de uma caixa de correio para fins de descoberta eletrônica.

span.span: Defines the hold state of a mailbox for the purpose of eDiscovery.

summary.span: O enumeração é aplicável a clientes que visam o Exchange Online e versões do Exchange, começando com o Exchange Server 2013.

span.span: The enumeration is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.HoldStatus Failed = int32(4)

summary.span: Operação de espera com falha para a caixa de correio de destino.

span.span: Failed hold operation for the target mailbox.

summary.span: O campo de falha é aplicável para clientes que visam o Exchange Online e versões do Exchange, começando com o Exchange Server 2013.

span.span: The Failed field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.HoldStatus NotOnHold = int32(0)

summary.span: O campo NotOnHold é aplicável para clientes que visam o Exchange Online e versões do Exchange, começando com o Exchange Server 2013.

span.span: The NotOnHold field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.HoldStatus OnHold = int32(2)

summary.span: Uma espera de descoberta eletrônica da caixa de correio de destino.

span.span: An eDiscovery hold on the target mailbox.

summary.span: O campo OnHold é aplicável para clientes que visam o Exchange Online e versões do Exchange, começando com o Exchange Server 2013.

span.span: The OnHold field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.HoldStatus PartialHold = int32(3)

summary.span: Algumas caixas de correio em espera.
O campo PartialHold é aplicável para clientes que visam o Exchange Online e versões do Exchange, começando com o Exchange Server 2013.

span.span: The PartialHold field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.HoldStatus Pending = int32(1)

summary.span: Colocando/removendo uma espera de descoberta eletrônica em andamento.

span.span: Placing/removing an eDiscovery hold in progress.

summary.span: O campo pendente é aplicável para clientes que visam o Exchange Online e versões do Exchange, começando com o Exchange Server 2013.

span.span: The Pending field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.
